name: Skies Aviation Academy
about: Skies Aviation Academy, located in picturesque Peraia, northern Greece, is the first EASA certified academy in the country, offering comprehensive airline pilot training. We provide an EASA approved full-time Integrated ATPL course, guiding students from zero flying experience to an Airline Transport Pilot Licence in 12 to 18 months. Our curriculum includes a Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL) with Multi-Engine (ME) and Instrument Rating (IR), as well as Multi Crew Cooperation (MCC), Upset Prevention and Recovery Training (UPRT), and Performance-based Navigation (PBN) Training. Our fleet consists of Single-Engine and Multi-Engine Piston aircraft with EFIS and a state-of-the-art ALSIM ALX FNPTII Simulator. We strive to provide professional training in a friendly environment, leveraging excellent year-round weather conditions to ensure our students become commercial pilots efficiently. Our mission is to contribute to a vibrant future of aviation through the success of our students.
